body: This doujin is very funny

I actually really liked how this turned out. 
End of the day, he realised how dumb it is to worry about someone's virginity. (I know it's a big thing to worry about falling behind when it comes to experience and stuff.)
He got to be with her at the end of the day. That's what matters. Though, it was intriguing to see him put her on a pedestal and agonise over it all.
So she lost her virginity because her senpai use sex toy or something like fake dick to have sex with her? Worse is maybe her senpai is a Futanari, use her real dick to fuck her.

@Social Healer Well, girls also have these insecurities. And it isn't without a reason: Humans can be devious against each other, even the nicest of persons can snap and end up completely destroying the other's social life by exposing how inexperienced and clumsy they were. The only protection is not taking the risk... I don't think virginity is that important of itself, but the desire to have long lasting, serious relationships is. Therefore, I consider extreme promiscuity a bad sign.

(the relationship i mean) and i will suffer from inside. so that's why i broke up with the last girlfriend. and before the one i had, i didn't do her cuz she was a virgin. i mean i was not fully sure that i'll be with her. so as a selfish guy who i am that want all of my girl's to only myself. i can't be unfair right. of course i did it with the non virgin one. i mean she got nothing to loose and. she was pretty chill with it to the point it almost hurts. well idk why i'm writing this. ur done well coming this far. have a good day. lol

It does matter whether the girl is a virgin or not, since purity comes in many terms, some mental, some physical. Just because you acknowledge one aspect of purity does not mean you can invalidate the need for the other. Not all men (sexist!) like prefer the same, after all. What does not matter is the criteria when you love and accept the person for what she is. imo.
